EmailTemplate.name: 201709_Americas_Email_Falcon_DU-875_Drop-in_JRD.201709_Americas_Email_Falcon_DU-
EmailTemplate.subject: The Honeywell DU-875 Display Upgrade for Falcon 900 is Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.pentastaraviation.com/]]>
The DU-875 Display Upgrade for Falcon 900C/EX by Honeywell and Pentastar Aviation Improve your pilot’s view and add instant value to your aircraft blue book value with the DU-875 upgrade for Falcon 900C/EX by Honeywell and Pentastar Aviation.
Replace one or all of your DU-870 displays and receive the many benefits that come with this easy and cost-effective upgrade:
- Reduced cost of ownership
- Increased display reliability
- Reduced weight
- Maintains full cockpit integration - New 24 month display warranty
- Growth plan that takes advantage of future technologies and applications
Avoid obsolescence and save up to $200,000* when you take advantage of this limited time trade-in credit. Contact Pentastar Aviation today to learn more about the DU-875 upgrade for Falcon 900C/EX.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201707_Americas_Email_Cessna_DU-875_Drop-in_JRD_201704_Americas_LandingPage_DU-875_Drop-in_mih.html]]>
*Savings are based on operator upgrading up to five (5) DU-870 display units to the DU-875 LCD display units.
